name: Gabe Newell Simulator
summary: In Gabe Newell Simulator you can manage Steam releasing and creating new games and also in the story mode you can play as Gaben and help him in his fight against other software house, talk with his employees and decide the fate of Half Life 3!
info:
• 平台: Mac/Linux/PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2015年12月14日
